statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -20 \\ 15 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 56 \\ -39 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
